title: Bering Land Bridge National Preserve: Current Conditions
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Current Conditions             Alerts & Conditions         Alerts    Information        Serpentine Hot Springs Bunkhouse - Reserved  Alert 1 , Severity ,information ,, Serpentine Hot Springs Bunkhouse - Reserved   Serpentine Hot Springs Bunkhouse will be reserved from July 7-10 for the Centennial BioBlitz. There will be over 20 children and park staff occupying the area. For more information contact Katie Cullen at Kathleen_Cullen@nps.gov /907-443-6116.
